CodeplexIssue.Title: Can't install it on windows 8
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
I made a setup project(vs2010,office2007) and build the setup file on windows 7. It's no problem to install it on windows 7. But when I installed it on windows 8. There is no com addin appeared in office addin list. The ribbon is also not displayed. I also changed x86 of the setup project to x64. It's the same result. Does any who met this problem? How did you settled it?
By the way, I am using netoffice 3.5(.net framework).

CodeplexComment.Author: dujunsheng
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: The function ComRegisterFunctionAttribute: RegisterFunction wasn't executed.

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: msi doesnt call the register/unregister methods. never!you have to set the reg keys in the setup project.see the deployment sample in the download section.
